item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Two new PebbleOS watches (898 points | 320 comments)
2. Apple restricts Pebble from being awesome with iPhones (1010 points | 639 comments)
3. Show HN: I made a tool to port tweets to Bluesky mantaining their original date (232 points | 83 comments)
4. Show HN: "Git who" – A new CLI tool for industrial-scale Git blaming (59 points | 38 comments)
5. Karatsuba Matrix Multiplication and Its Efficient Hardware Implementations (41 points | discuss)
6. HTTrack Website Copier (109 points | 29 comments)
7. A Tale of Four Kernels [pdf] (2008) (27 points | 3 comments)
8. Designing Electronics That Work (114 points | 34 comments)
9. US appeals court rules AI generated art cannot be copyrighted (378 points | 267 comments)
10. Google to buy Wiz for $32B (358 points | 544 comments)
11. Turkish university annuls Erdogan rival's degree, preventing run for president (175 points | 49 comments)
12. Nvidia Dynamo: A Datacenter Scale Distributed Inference Serving Framework (55 points | 11 comments)
13. Amazon to kill off local Alexa processing, all voice requests shipped to cloud (337 points | 89 comments)
14. Preview: Amazon S3 Tables and Lakehouse in DuckDB (104 points | 29 comments)
15. Microsoft quantum computing claim still lacks evidence (21 points | 3 comments)
16. This is no world for an axolotl (64 points | 23 comments)
17. Spaceium Inc (YC S24) Is Hiring a Software Engineer ( | hide)
18. PeerTube v7.1 Is Out (105 points | 19 comments)
19. Verification-First Development (34 points | 15 comments)
20. Shopkeeper (7 points | 1 comment)
21. Rust on the RP2350 (2024) (121 points | 33 comments)
22. 20 Years of YC / HN (77 points | 18 comments)
23. Fedora 42 Beta (143 points | 68 comments)
24. The race is on to build the most complex machine (82 points | 47 comments)
25. Show HN: I made a live multiplayer Minesweeper game (156 points | 61 comments)
26. SheepIt Render Farm server code goes open source (126 points | 19 comments)
27. Ask HN: How Do I Escape Homelessness After Rebuilding My Mental Health? (124 points | 76 comments)
28. Stamina Is a Quiet Advantage (154 points | 72 comments)
29. Block YouTube ads on AppleTV by decrypting and stripping ads from Profobuf (2022) (626 points | 380 comments)
30. Underrated Soft Skills: Charisma (87 points | 86 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
